column2: "1. Are you ok?"
"2. What are you doing?"

"Oh, <%me>.
I'm not hurt or anything, nor was I actually doing anything important, however..."
"I was just wondering why my chest was made so tiny compared to Ulc's."
"Ahh, come back, please! This is serious! This is a legit reason to worry, you know?"
"We, the Xiera-type High-Casts, are stationed aboard each of the ARKS ships. Each one manages the controls of said ships."
"We became operational 2 years ago around the same time <%me> went into Cold Sleep."
"By specializing in only Ship Control and Management, we almost have zero combat abilities. We exist only to manage the ARKS ships."
"Ah, just to be clear. I have no complaints. I do love ship management after all."
"While it's possible for us to be programmed to think like that, it's alright because I'm happy!"
"Now, this is where it becomes important. The template used in our personality came directly from Ulc."
"Normally, such a thing would have taken too long, if started from scratch. So it's why Ulc was chosen to have her personality used as a template."
"Despite having said that, look at this difference! This difference!"
"If they were to use someone as a model, I wish they would have used their physique and not just their personality as well!"
"I mean, I get it. A bigger chest would cut into the development costs, as well as getting in the way of deskwork..."
"As a manager, I can accept this. However, as a woman, this is unacceptable! My pride feels like it's being laughed at!"
"Every time I have a conversation with Ulc, there's this slight irritating feeling I get in my chest... This is unacceptable mental hygiene!"
"The other Xiera-types agree! Alright! Time to file a complaint through Xiao!"
"Xiao! I have a report..."
"He didn't listen to what I have to say!? In fact, there's a message scolding me!"
"Uuuuu... I'm sorry, sorry. I already knew it would be like this. I've calculated it beforehand."
"But still, the fact I couldn't keep quiet, is proof I'm similar to a human."
"Hey, these feels of mine, you understand right, <%me>?"
